summary_gpt: The filing is a secretarial compliance report for L&T Finance Limited for the year ending March 31, 2025, confirming adherence to various SEBI regulations and listing obligations. It was prepared by M/s. Alwyn Jay & Co., certifying the company's compliance with applicable legal and regulatory requirements.

L&T Finance Limited has uploaded an audio recording of its investor and analyst meeting held on April 28, 2025, covering Q4FY2024-25 and FY2025 financial performance and strategy updates. The company has made this information available on its official website as per regulatory requirements.

L&T Finance Limited has submitted a presentation for Q4FY25 and FY25 to the Indian stock exchanges, which is available on their website. The presentation provides general information about the company's financial products and services without making any specific investment recommendations.

L&T Finance Limited reported a record full-year consolidated profit after tax of Rs. 2,644 crore for FY25, with a 14% YoY growth, driven by strong retail disbursements and asset quality. The company also declared its highest ever final dividend of Rs. 2.75 per share, reflecting robust financial health and responsible growth strategies.

L&T Finance Limited announced its audited financial results for FY2024-25, recommended a final dividend of Rs. 2.75 per share, and approved the appointment of new independent and secretarial auditors, along with the appointment of Mr. Dhananjaya Tambe as an independent director subject to shareholder approval.

L&T Finance Limited has approved the allotment of 2,483,348 equity shares to employees exercising their stock options under the company's ESOP scheme, with the shares to rank equally with existing shares and be eligible for future dividends. The allotment was approved by the Nomination and Remuneration Committee on April 24, 2025.
